@AyannaPressley @JacksonLeeTX18 @staceyabrams Voter suppression is just one more relic of Jim Crow, and we need to say so. That’s why I have a plan to strengthen voting in America. It starts with restoring the Voting Rights Act.

@AyannaPressley @JacksonLeeTX18 The federal government helped create the racial divide in this country through decades of active, state-sponsored discrimination and that means the federal government has an obligation to fix it. And I have a lot of plans for how we can begin to fix it together.

Today Senator Rubio met w/ Dr. Lobsang Sangay, President of the Tibetan Central Administration. 
Rubio restated his commitment to protecting the human rights of Tibetans in the face of Beijing's growing repression. This is why he introduced the Tibet Policy & Support Act. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EJ6y0oYWsAwMJVu.jpg
